ygData.subject: Re: lost mana when target corners
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have similar experiances often i wish to root a fleeing MOB and i see my timer go down i casted a spell and until it hit a target, i cannot see it this
ygData.messageBody:
At 16.35 02/06/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Star Gazer <lsgazer@...>
>
>Does it bug anyone besides me how you lose mana when you're chasing a
>fleeing monster down a corridor, say BlackBurrow or Mistmoore, and the
>target JUST rounds a corner before the timer has finished? "You cannot
>see your target", the mana is lost. I can understand the spell not
>connecting, but why the mana loss? Drives me nuts.

I have similar experiances often i wish to root a fleeing MOB and i see my
timer go down i casted a spell and until it hit a target, "i cannot see it"
this is bug in prediction routine in client side i think or a casting
timing is connected with lag? as i chase a MOB i can see many times a green
root spell circle on some realy strange places in FRONT OF MONSTER not
after him !! anyone other seen this?


>
